Get game advanced box score information

cfb_game_box_advanced.Rd

Get game advanced box score information

cfb_game_box_advanced(game_id, long = FALSE)

Arguments

game_id

(Integer required): Game ID filter for querying a single game Can be found using the cfbscrapR::cfb_game_info() function
long

(Logical default `FALSE`): Return the data in a long format.

Source

https://api.collegefootballdata.com/game/box/advanced

Value

A data frame with 2 rows and 52 variables:

team

character.

ppa_overall_total

double.

ppa_overall_quarter1

double.

ppa_overall_quarter2

double.

ppa_overall_quarter3

double.

ppa_overall_quarter4

double.

ppa_passing_total

double.

ppa_passing_quarter1

double.

ppa_passing_quarter2

double.

ppa_passing_quarter3

double.

ppa_passing_quarter4

double.

ppa_rushing_total

double.

ppa_rushing_quarter1

double.

ppa_rushing_quarter2

double.

ppa_rushing_quarter3

double.

ppa_rushing_quarter4

double.

success_rates_overall_total

double.

success_rates_overall_quarter1

double.

success_rates_overall_quarter2

double.

success_rates_overall_quarter3

double.

success_rates_overall_quarter4

double.

success_rates_standard_downs_total

double.

success_rates_standard_downs_quarter1

double.

success_rates_standard_downs_quarter2

double.

success_rates_standard_downs_quarter3

success_rates_standard_downs_quarter4

Examples


cfb_game_box_advanced(401114233)

#> 2020-11-30 13:54:43: Scraping game advanced box score data for game_id '401114233'...
